name: Paradoxia
description:
Best played with full screen and headphones on.

Paradoxia is a 3-minute visual interactive narrative that attempts to explain an interesting phenomenon in a minimalistic way.

Controls:

in 2D: Move left.

In 3D: Press left/right to change direction, then Up to move forward (tank control).

Credits:

Art,  shader programming - Anmar Al-Sharif.

Programming - Baraa Bakr Siddiq.

Music - Abdulmalik Zubailah, Faris Alsobyani.

Narrative and voice over: Abdulmalik Zubailah.

Creative direction - Rayan Al-Sharief, Anmar Al-Sharif.

Feel free to post your story interpretation in the comments below

#thelorecontinues
